title: Russia and Ukraine Each Have Over 100,000 Casualties, Top US General Says
description: Gen. Mark Milley, the chairman of the Joint Chiefs of Staff, called the coming winter months an opportune time for the two sides to hold peace talks, though that prospect appears dim.
dc:creator: Helene Cooper
media:credit: Ivor Prickett for The New York Times
media:description: A destroyed Russian tank in a field in Petrivka, an area of the Kherson region that Ukraine recaptured in early October.
